title: The Bowater story
creator_credit: Bowater, World Wide Pictures and Arthur Graham
brief_description: A story of industrial growth and enterprise - in 1926 the British company Bowater began making paper as well as selling it, and now owns mills and forests in many parts of the world including Norway, Sweden, USA, France, New Zealand and Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Bowater, World Wide Pictures and Arthur Graham
